title: Show rich RunRecord data in details pane
description:
When viewing a completed task, show the full RunRecord data including:
- Run metrics (duration, turns, tokens, cost, model)
- Tool history with icons (✓/✗) and timing
- Thinking content (collapsed/truncated)
- Full output

The buildRunRecordContent() function exists but may need enhancement. Ensure it's being called when selecting closed tasks. Wire up TaskRunRecordMsg from engine to TUI.
